Original: You're late... What took you so long!?
Well, I'll overlook it this once.
[Page]
I've heard you've helped our son out
a few times already. As his father,
I'm grateful for that.
[Page]
But I need your help one more time.
I don't know what got into him, but
he went to the [Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0]...
[Page]
This time, we didn't even get a
carrier pigeon. But there's a trio of
explorers over there who saw him.
[Page]
Unfortunately, their info is all we
have to go on. They're a sordid bunch,
but please talk to them!
Translation: You're late... What took you so long!?
Well, I'll overlook it this once.
[Page]
I've heard you've helped our son out
a few times already. As his father,
I'm grateful for that.
[Page]
But I need your help one more time.
I don't know what got into him, but
he went to the [Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0]...
[Page]
This time, we didn't even get a
carrier pigeon. But there's a trio of
explorers over there who saw him.
[Page]
Unfortunately, their info is all we
have to go on. They're a sordid bunch,
but please talk to them!

Original: There you are! Did you find Raht?
My son...?
Translation: There you are! Did you find Raht?
My son...?

Original: [Color:5]Have you found Raht?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Have you found Raht?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: Quit stringing me along! You had my
hopes up there for a second! But I'll
let it go...
Translation: Quit stringing me along! You had my
hopes up there for a second! But I'll
let it go...

Original: Hmm... I've talked to [Color:5]three[Color:0] explorers
here in this bar who saw Raht.
[Page]
If you get all their stories and put
them together, you might be able to
narrow down where Raht is.
[Page]
Bunch of jackals... Demanding money
from a desperate father... I can
barely afford your reward!
Translation: Hmm... I've talked to [Color:5]three[Color:0] explorers
here in this bar who saw Raht.
[Page]
If you get all their stories and put
them together, you might be able to
narrow down where Raht is.
[Page]
Bunch of jackals... Demanding money
from a desperate father... I can
barely afford your reward!

Original: I-Is that true!? No, sorry, of course
I believe you. So where is he?
Translation: I-Is that true!? No, sorry, of course
I believe you. So where is he?

Original: All right! I'll make the arrangements
to send out a rescue team!
Translation: All right! I'll make the arrangements
to send out a rescue team!

Original: What's the big idea? Do you get off
on seeing me panic like this? I'll
show you people panic!
[Page]
Raht wasn't at the place you pointed
out. You're sure you found him?
[Page]
I don't want to call you a liar, but
I need you to give me the correct
location next time. Come on...
Translation: What's the big idea? Do you get off
on seeing me panic like this? I'll
show you people panic!
[Page]
Raht wasn't at the place you pointed
out. You're sure you found him?
[Page]
I don't want to call you a liar, but
I need you to give me the correct
location next time. Come on...

Original: You guys! They found him... My son...
Raht's alive! He was carried into the
clinic earlier.
[Page]
Any later, and my son might have
frozen to death. Thank you... thank
you so much...
[Page]
Kind explorers... I don't have much
to repay you with, but I want you to
take the reward I left all the same.
[Page]
*sigh* Now if only my idiot son would
actually learn his lesson...
Translation: You guys! They found him... My son...
Raht's alive! He was carried into the
clinic earlier.
[Page]
Any later, and my son might have
frozen to death. Thank you... thank
you so much...
[Page]
Kind explorers... I don't have much
to repay you with, but I want you to
take the reward I left all the same.
[Page]
*sigh* Now if only my idiot son would
actually learn his lesson...

Original: My wife, daughter, and I can't
understand why our meek son suddenly
started acting so wild...
[Page]
Has he told you why? Maybe it's
something he can't share with his
family...
Translation: My wife, daughter, and I can't
understand why our meek son suddenly
started acting so wild...
[Page]
Has he told you why? Maybe it's
something he can't share with his
family...
